review: Do yourself a favor and buy a Roku3, Apple TV has constant sync issues, cannot find the network, cannot connect to the Itunes Library when it finally does connect. Spent hours setting it up only to  turn it on a few days later and have to do the whole process again. I ran a network cable to the unit hoping that a software update might resolve the issue but that did not help either. Stay away!
